Package unbboolean.j3dbool

Class Summary
BooleanModeller Class used to apply boolean operations on solids.
Bound Representation of a bound - the extremes of a 3d component for each coordinate.
Face Representation of a 3D face (triangle).
Line Representation of a 3d line or a ray (represented by a direction and a point).
Object3D Data structure about a 3d solid to apply boolean operations in it.
Segment Represents a line segment resulting from a intersection of a face and a plane.
Solid Class representing a 3D solid.
Vertex Represents of a 3d face vertex.
